last_episode_to_air.name: The Final Intercut: So I'm Your Horse
last_episode_to_air.overview: After learning what she must sacrifice in order to destroy the Holy Grail, Simone’s love for Jay is put to the test. At the Pyramid Facility, Wiley faces his own demise and attempts to earn his boots.

name: Mrs. Davis
overview: Sister Simone partners with her ex-boyfriend on a globe-spanning journey to destroy Mrs. Davis, a powerful artificial intelligence.
tagline: She wants to talk to you.

episodes.name: Mother of Mercy: The Call of the Horse
episodes.overview: A nun is forced to leave her quiet life at a convent when an all-powerful artificial intelligence known as Mrs. Davis enlists her to complete an epic quest.

episodes.name: Zwei Sie Piel mit Seitung Sie Wirtschaftung
episodes.overview: As she contemplates participating in the outrageous quest given to her by Mrs. Davis, Simone discovers that her ex-boyfriend, Wiley, is now part of an underground resistance devoted to destroying the all-powerful AI.

episodes.name: A Baby with Wings, a Sad Boy with Wings and a Great Helmet
episodes.overview: While pursuing a lead through the English countryside, Wiley becomes sidetracked by a bizarre endurance competition, reigniting tensions with Simone and exposing old scars and long-kept secrets.

episodes.name: Beautiful Things That Come with Madness
episodes.overview: A new mission from Jay forces Simone to honor her vows and a kidnapping exposes a conspiracy.

episodes.name: A Great Place to Drink to Gain Control of Your Drink
episodes.overview: Simone and Wiley’s hunt for Clara, the red-haired woman, leads them to an enigmatic new source and together they uncover the dangerous truth about their connection to her.

episodes.name: Allison Treasures: A Southern California Story
episodes.overview: After learning the whereabouts of the Holy Grail, Simone partners with Wiley and the Resistance to heist a special suit needed for its extraction. The only problem — the suit is currently in the possession of Simone’s mother, Celeste.

episodes.name: Great Gatsby 2001: A Space Odyssey
episodes.overview: With the Lazarus Shroud secured, Simone and Celeste set sail on a perilous journey in pursuit of the Holy Grail. Wiley receives an unexpected offer from Mrs. Davis that could rewrite his future.

guest_stars.character: Prime Minister Selena Fernandez De Las Casas
guest_stars.name: Bertila Damas

episodes.name: The Final Intercut: So I'm Your Horse
episodes.overview: After learning what she must sacrifice in order to destroy the Holy Grail, Simone’s love for Jay is put to the test. At the Pyramid Facility, Wiley faces his own demise and attempts to earn his boots.
